root.str: Right-click to rotate
Left-click to move
Right-click to rotate
Adjust length with scroll wheel
People say the darkness has been wiped from our world... but I know\nwhat I've seen.
There is darkness in the hearts of our people.
The strong always tread upon the weak. It happened to me.
However…
The world still has heroes who can help the weak.
A kind soul helped me on that fateful day, so I know they're\nout there.
Those who can help and protect others are the people who make\nthis world great.
I'm going to become one of those heroes...
No matter what.
People fear the unknown. My parents did.
The darkness in me drove them to abandon me.
If the old man hadn't found me and taken me in…
I probably wouldn't be here.
The old man didn't care about the power within me and raised me\nas his own.
History, science, art... he taught me so many things I didn't care about.
I found out later that he was once Maple World's greatest hero.
I should thank him for raising me, and teaching me to be strong.
And I'll surpass him, by becoming a stronger warrior!
New heroes are meant to eclipse those that came before.
Isn't that the best way to show respect for their efforts?
So get ready, old man! Today's the day I beat you!
Class, open your textbooks to…
What's this? We're one student short.
That's fine. We can wait.
Professor! We have quite a lot of magic to learn today.
Are you going to waste our time waiting for one tardy student?
An astute point, as usual, Miss Class President.
Let's begin. What can anyone here tell me about monsters?
My brightest student…
...is skipping class. Again.
So much wasted genius…
Wah, I don't know!
After the darkness vanished 15 years ago, I thought my duty would be\nto pray and sing of our past glory.
When I heard our peace was threatened again, a great fear grew\nin my heart.
But along with that fear... was hope. Hope that I would find\nnew purpose.
The guardian priests serve the will of the divine light.
And so, it is my duty to bring glory to this land once more!
Not everything is as simple as it appears.
It's an easy truth to forget.
But no matter how hidden, the truth is always revealed in the end.
Sometimes, you get to see the real side of a person for just a moment.
A person who is stronger than anyone else, but keeps it hidden...
A person who never hesitates to help when they are needed...
A person whose footsteps I work hard to follow in.
My whole life, people have told me...
"Science alone cannot bring peace to Maple World."
That is a reasonable hypothesis... if you're an idiot!
The right technology? It can accomplish anything. It can break through\nany barrier. It can level any playing field!
So, my faithful assistant... Who's going to fix the world?
You are, Boss!
A perfect answer! 10 out of 10!
I can't remember anything about my parents.
My earliest childhood memories are of cold, dirty alleyways.
But I was never alone.
My friends were my family, the ones who stood by me.
Even now, we live the way we want. Our limits are our own.
No one can hold us back. I didn't choose the life of a rogue...
But I love it!
The Rooks.
We are the vanguard of darkness led by the Dark Lord, one of\nthe Seven Commanders.
We have one mission: To eliminate everything that stands in\nthe way of the Black Mage.
As a Rook, my own thoughts and emotions were purged so that\nI could focus on my work.
However…
I've begun to... feel again. And those feelings confuse me.
Am I really working toward a better world?
Am I becoming a monster?
For once... I don't know what to do…
Farewell...
Master.
Don't throw your life away.
Your destiny lies elsewhere.
You've answered the call. Now hear the story!
It begins with two goddesses: one light, one dark.
They created many worlds, but Maple World was their\ngreatest.
In every realm, there must be balance.
But the goddess of light loved Maple World and warded it\nagainst the darkness.
Fearing this imbalance, the goddess of darkness lashed out.
So began their terrible war.
The battle was long and brutal, but, with the help of her sages,\nthe goddess of light defeated her sister.
As the goddess of darkness fell, she unleashed her fury,\npoisoning Maple World with her power.
Unwilling to see her beloved creation destroyed, the goddess of light\nsacrificed herself to save it.
What remained of her power became the great protector,\nEmpress Ereve.
Ereve gathered seven heroes to stand against the darkness.
Try as they might, they could not stop their world's slow corruption.
Ereve and her sages created three relics with power over life, space,\nand time: the Lapentas.
These Lapentas could gather up the darkness and cleanse it all at once.\nSo they thought...
The day of their bold plan came, and the shadows pooled\nin one place...
Even as they cast their purification ritual, the sages were gripped\nby the darkness.
It took all of the Lapentas' power to protect Maple World from being\nutterly destroyed.
The ritual site was corrupted, the whole region becoming\na dreaded no-man's land.
Two of Ereve's heroes, Cerian and Balon, stepped forward.
They journeyed into this "Land of Darkness" on a mission to save\nanyone trapped inside.
There, they worked to complete the purification ritual... and,\nin doing so, they met their end.
The Land of Darkness was sealed away, where it could hurt\nno one else.
With their noble sacrifice, these two heroes had bought peace.
But now, the shadows stir once more, and this miraculous peace\nis nearing its end.
The time has come for champions to rise again.
This is a story of heroes.
This... is your story.
There's a chance we might be outnumbered.
Indeed…
Try and keep up.
I see you've found new allies.
They won't save you from me.
You!?
Playtime is over—
Time to die.
Bring it on!
Hurry up, the ship's about to launch!
Flight checks complete—\nBut we still have crew on the ground!
We cannot wait any longer.
But what about—
Aye captain!
Take us up!\nFire the XR shells, on my markl!
What?!
And fire!
This isn't over.
Karl, Luanna. Look there.\nThey really did it.
A new era dawns on Maple World.
Brave guardians, please watch over us from above.
Safe journeys, Sky Fortress.
No mercy!
It's over for you!
En garde!
Let's go!
This might burn!
Spin 'em up!
Don't give up.
간다.
Surprise!
Brighter than the stars in the night
Together our hearts shine
So radiantly
Forget the darkness of the past\n(Rise up again)
And the trembling in your heart\n(Don't be afraid)
Your story has only just begun\n(Don't lose heart)
The future is calling\n(I'm right beside you)
Don't you dare forget
That guiding light of hope\nis a promise
Run forth untethered\nby your fear
Stay true to yourself and your dream\nwill come to pass
It's far too soon for your story to end
Call out the name\nthat trembles on your lips
Even when you have no voice,\nI'll hear your cry
Dry your eyes,\n'cause I'll
Hold you tight
사라졌던 영웅의 등장에 놀랐는가?
그렇다. 내가 바로 빛의 마법사 킬리안이다.
그리고 또 다른 이름
검은 마법사.
놀라는 것도 무리는 아니지.
한때 7영웅의 수장이 바로 나였으니.
이제 그날의 진실을 말할 때가 된 것 같구나.
나는 라펜타 봉인을 위해
7영웅 중 하나이자 나의 친우인 바론과 함께\n 어둠의 땅으로 향했다.
그리고, 그곳에 도달한 우리는 깨달았지.
봉인을 위해선 여제 에레브의 힘이 필요하다는 것을.
이를 알리기 위해 바론은 트라이아로 향했다.
나는 그곳에 남아 상황을 지켜보았지만
생각보다 빠르게 악화되는 봉인의 상태에\n결단을 내려야만 했다.
혼자서라도 봉인을 시도해야 했어.
내 목숨과 바꿔서라도 말이야.
다행히 난 봉인에 성공했지만 정신이 혼미해지고 있었다.
그리고 돌연, 바론의 기운이 끊어졌다!
나는, 처음으로 여제를 의심했다.
여제가 늦는 것이 아니라 \n우리 요청이 묵살당한 거라면?
빛의 상징인 여제가 우릴 버렸다면…?
그 순간, 나는 보았다.
빛의 여제가 가진 강력한 힘이 이 세상을 멸망시키는 모습을.
빛의 창 끝이 어둠이 아닌 우리를 향하는 날
우리가 맞게 될 빛으로부터의 파멸을…
그날 이후 나는 여제의 파멸을 막기 위해 여러 계획을 세우고 실행해왔다.
그 중 가장 심혈을 기울여 준비한 것이 바로 이, 검은 달이다.
여제 에레브… 그녀는 이곳에 봉인되어야 해.
최근 트라이아에 나타난 검은 물질들을 보았겠지?
그건 바로, 여제 안에 잠들어 있던 불안의 미래가 형상화되어 나타난 것.
언젠가 다가올 파멸의 증거다!
빛으로부터의 파멸
그 예언을 막기 위한 방법은 오직 이것 뿐이다.
과거의 영웅은 죽었다.
내게 남은 것은 오직 세상의 파괴를 막기 위한 간절한 소망 뿐.
예언을 아는 자라면, 이 진실을 외면할 수 없을 것이다.
애송이, 이제 너도 모든 것을 알게 되었고…
선택만이 남았다.
진실과 거짓
선택하라
